verbs.description: The show - piece mass arrests in Northeast Ohio of [ARG1: immigrant garden workers and meatpackers] [V: orchestrated] [ARG0: by the Trump administration] are a challenge to what we stand for as a nation , writes Steven S. Volk , an emeritus professor of Latin American history .
